column1: My office, I've spent countless nights here working on cases.
I can access plenty of resources from what's on my bookcase by clicking on those books and folders.
I'll pin it to the corkboard, and from there I can flip through all the information.
I can connect them with yarn by clicking on their tacks, and pull the yarn down with a right click.
Can't forget my desk either, right now it's where I'll sort through my polaroids to solve the case.
In future cases, this will certainly get cluttered, but for now it's home to my file and a terrible cup of joe.
Once I've taken a look at all the evidence, I put the correct polaroids into their places on the opened file.
As long as I've got some confidence, I'll submit it to Lieutenant Provoost.
